ygData.subject: Re: patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour  question
ygData.msgSnippet: Unless you are a druid, follow Enteri s advice. Druids do need the better grade leather armor
ygData.messageBody:
Unless you are a druid, follow Enteri's advice. Druids do need the better grade
leather armor

Entreri wrote:

> From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>
> I suggest doing only patchwork..after u reach 26[cap for
> patchwork].STOP...go on to blacksmithing.Making Studded armour is a waste of
> money,its hard and expensive and low AC too,better on making banded mail]
>
> 1.Levels1-3:put all 15pt in Tailoring
> 2.Levels 4-6:by level6,u should maxout ya tailoring
> 3.Levels7+:all out pts on blacksmithing until "have to pay"stage
> 4.Levels4-16:sharpening,making skewers
> 5.Levels17-25:banded armour
> 6.Levels26++:Not sure heard its bronze plate after banded
>
> Entreri
>
> Email: drizzt@...
> ICQ UIN: 2326860
> Previewer, Singularity Gaming Network
> http://www.sg-gaming.net
> Your Single Source of Everything Gaming
>

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Yap Sieh Roy <sryap@...>
> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> Date: Tuesday, June 22, 1999 6:38 PM
> Subject: [sg-everquest] patchwork, studded and reinforced leather armour
> question
>
> >From: "Yap Sieh Roy" <sryap@...>
> >
> >hi,
> >
> >been trying to practise my tailoring skillz.. i got a couple of questions
> >abt making armour, hope u guys can help.
> >
> >ruined pelt + pattern = patchwork armour
> >medium pelt + studs + pattern = studded armour
> >hi-quality pelt + file + pattern = reinforced armour
> >
> >the above is as far as i understand from the tailoring book. there is only
> 2
> >slots in the sewing kit so.patchwork is no problem but what about studded
> >and reinforced where 3 items are required? what is the sequence of making
> >them ?
> >
> >thanks !
> >roy
> >
